item.title: Supabase PrivateLink is now available
item.description: Connect to your Supabase database without touching the public internet.

item.title: Introducing: Postgres Best Practices
item.description: We are releasing Agent Skills for Postgres Best Practices to help AI coding agents write high quality, correct Postgres code.

item.title: When to use Read Replicas vs. bigger compute
item.description: A practical guide to diagnosing database slowdowns and choosing between vertical scaling and Read Replicas based on your workload, budget, and performance bottlenecks.

item.title: Introducing TRAE SOLO integration with Supabase
item.description: TRAE IDE now integrates with Supabase, enabling developers to manage their entire backend infrastructure without leaving the IDE. Browse databases, manage storage, configure auth, and more.

item.title: Supabase Security Retro: 2025
item.description: A summary of Supabase platform security changes made in 2025 and the security defaults planned for 2026.

item.title: Sync Stripe Data to Your Supabase Database in One Click
item.description: Announcing official support for the Stripe Sync Engine in the Supabase Dashboard. Get a one-click integration that syncs your Stripe data directly into your Supabase database.

item.title: Building ChatGPT Apps with Supabase Edge Functions and mcp-use
item.description: Learn how to build a ChatGPT app that connects to your Supabase database using mcp-use and Edge Functions. Create interactive widgets for schema exploration, data viewing, and SQL queries.

item.title: Own Your Observability: Supabase Metrics API
item.description: Stream your Supabase database telemetry into any Prometheus-compatible observability stack with the Metrics API. Full control over monitoring, visualization, and alerting.

item.title: Introducing iceberg-js: A JavaScript Client for Apache Iceberg
item.description: A minimal, vendor-agnostic JavaScript client for the Apache Iceberg REST Catalog API, providing type-safe catalog management for JavaScript and TypeScript developers.

item.title: Introducing Supabase for Platforms
item.description: Use Supabase as a platform for your own business and tools

item.title: Adding Async Streaming to Postgres Foreign Data Wrappers
item.description: Supabase Wrappers introduces asynchronous streaming to Postgres Foreign Data Wrappers, enabling efficient, memory-safe queries for massive analytical workloads.

item.title: Build "Sign in with Your App" using Supabase Auth
item.description: Supabase Auth now supports OAuth 2.1 and OpenID Connect server capabilities, turning your project into a full-fledged identity provider for AI agents, third-party developers, and enterprise SSO.

item.title: Introducing Seven New Email Templates for Supabase Auth
item.description: Notify users when security-sensitive actions are taken on their account.

item.title: The new Supabase power for Kiro
item.description: Build full-stack applications faster with the Kiro IDE using deep knowledge of your Supabase project, best practices for database migrations, edge functions, and security policies.

item.title: Introducing Analytics Buckets
item.description: Use Analytics Buckets to store huge datasets in Supabase Storage with Apache Iceberg and columnar Parquet format, optimized for analytical workloads.

item.title: Introducing Supabase ETL
item.description: A change-data-capture pipeline that replicates your Postgres tables to analytical destinations like Analytics Buckets and BigQuery in near real time.

item.title: Introducing Vector Buckets
item.description: Introducing vector storage in Supabase: a durable storage layer with similarity search built-in.

item.title: Snap, Inc. Launches Snap Cloud, Powered by Supabase
item.description: Snap Cloud is a new managed backend platform for developers building on Spectacles, powered by Supabase.

item.title: Triplit joins Supabase
item.description: Matt Linkous is joining Supabase to expand third-party integrations and offline-first capabilities.

item.title: 1000 Y Combinator Founders Choose Supabase
item.description: Leading startups accelerate product development with Supabase backend platform.

item.description: Remote MCP server enables AI agents to connect with Supabase projects.

item.title: Enterprise speed, enterprise standards with Bolt Cloud + Supabase
item.description: With today's launch of Bolt Cloud, every project that needs a backend is powered by Supabase, giving developers enterprise standards with the speed of vibe coding.

item.description: Learn how to build scalable data processing pipelines using Supabase Edge Functions, cron jobs, and database queues and handle large workloads without timeouts or crashes.

item.description: Learn about the security risks of connecting AI agents to databases and how to implement defense in depth strategies to protect your data from prompt injection attacks.
